intro.heading: Hello
intro.body:
I am a creative language nerd with a great interest in literature and communication. I have previously worked with text production, editorial work, translations, and photography. Currently I am working as an editor and language reviewer. However, I still take on projects within the field of text production and translation. 

My 5 years at university have resulted in two bachelor's degrees from the Language and Communication Program, many courses in literary science and finally a specialisation in publishing.
intro.title: Editor • Writer • Proofreader

projects.title: Projects
projects.body: Here are a few of my previous projects.

list.title: Text Editor
list.name: Natur och Kultur
list.description: Text editor assignment for the publisher's educational materials department. The assignments developed my editing skills, as well as my accuracy and precision.

list.title: Podcast Summaries
list.name: Eget Förlag
list.description: I summarised podcast episodes in text. They were then published on their website.

list.title: Articles for Website and Social Media
list.name: Kommunikationssektionen på Mälardalens Universitet
list.description: I wrote reports and articles for their website and social media.

list.title: Text Material for a Career Fair
list.name: The Media Technology Day at Linköping University
list.description: The assignment was to translate text from Swedish to English, which was later on sent to their sponsors.

list.title: Photographer
list.name: Freelance
list.description: I performed photography jobs for clients including IKEA, Avis Car Rental, the Gold Sparkle Gala, and the Quarter Igor. The photography jobs have included everything from product images to mingle pictures.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: You can find my contact information right down below. Do not hesitate to contact me! I am looking forward to hearing from you.

resume.title: Resume
resume.body: Here is some information about my education and previous work.

education.body: This has deepened my knowledge of the publishing business. I have had the opportunity to work in both editorial and marketing and sales.
This has given me a deeper knowledge about the publishing industry and it has prepared me for work within the field.
The courses provided me with extensive understanding of literary history. It also strengthen my analytic and interpretative abilities within the field of literature from different historical eras.

education.degreeLevel: Bachelor's Programme in Language and Communication
education.body: I completed two Degrees of Bachelor of Arts, one with English as my major and one with Swedish.

experience.body: The freelance work involved textual editing. It taught me how to be thorough and adaptable to the intended structure.
I summarised podcast episodes in text. They were then published on their website.

experience.company: The Media Technology Day at Linköping University
experience.body: I translated text from Swedish to English for a career fair, which was later on sent to company sponsors.

experience.company: The Communication Department at Mälardalen University
experience.body: I did interviews and wrote articles for the University's website and social media platforms. The purpose was to inspire and motivate students. Some articles I wrote was on how to become an expert on digital meeting and how to keep in touch with your classmates during lockdown.
I taught English 5,6 and 7. This work taught me about structure, leadership and communication.

I did photography work for IKEA, Avis Car Rental, a gala called Guldstänk and a mall named Kvarteret Igor. I have done everything from product photos to events. This also resulted in a lot of work in Affinity Photo and Photoshop.
